imdb.plot outline: Consequences of Confederation is a 5-part video series featuring historians from York University. It explores a selection of outcomes of the 1867 British North America Act, the agreement among British colonies to form a new nation-state in North America. Confederation not only created the nation-state of Canada. It had tremendous consequences for the people who would come to live in that country.
imdb.title: Consequences of Confederation
plot: _Consequences of Confederation_ (qv) is a 5-part video series featuring historians from York University. It explores a selection of outcomes of the 1867 British North America Act, the agreement among British colonies to form a new nation-state in North America. Confederation not only created the nation-state of Canada. It had tremendous consequences for the people who would come to live in that country.
